title: Ergotron WorkFit-TL Sit Stand Desktop: In Motion
description: Simply place the WorkFit-TL on an open surface and you’re ready for action! Instantly sit or stand at your desk. Adding an optional monitor mount can further enhance your workflow. Learn more at http://www.ergotron.com/workfit
